Package accounts.bank.managing.thesis.bachelor.rastvdmy.service

Class CurrencyDataService

java.lang.Object
accounts.bank.managing.thesis.bachelor.rastvdmy.service.CurrencyDataService
@Service public class CurrencyDataService extends Object
This class is responsible for managing currency data. It is annotated with @Service to indicate that it's a Spring managed service. It uses CurrencyDataRepository to interact with the database. It also uses RestTemplate to make HTTP requests to an external API.

    • CurrencyDataService

      Constructs a new CurrencyDataService with the given repository and RestTemplate.

      currencyDataRepository - The CurrencyDataRepository to use.

  • Method Details

    • findAllCurrencies

      @Cacheable("currencies") public List<CurrencyData> findAllCurrencies()
      Retrieves all currency data.
      Returns:
      A list of all currency data.

    • findByCurrency

      @Cacheable(value="currencies", key="#currencyType") public CurrencyData findByCurrency(String currencyType)
      Retrieves currency data by its type.
      Parameters:
      currencyType - The type of the currency to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The retrieved currency data.

    • convertCurrency

      public CurrencyData convertCurrency(String baseCurrency, String targetCurrency)
      Converts a currency to another currency.
      Parameters:
      baseCurrency - The currency to convert from.
      targetCurrency - The currency to convert to.
      Returns:
      The converted currency data.

    • findAllExchangeRates

      @CacheEvict(value="currencies", allEntries=true) @Scheduled(fixedRate=86400000L) @PostConstruct public void findAllExchangeRates()
      Retrieves all exchange rates from an external API and updates the database. This method is scheduled to run every 24 hours.
